channel.title: How to make people members?
channel.description: Okay, so I've started to do my server.. And our website. We want to add a "buy members" option, but how do i make it so they get members?

item.title: How to make people members?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Mercifies is correct:

Most sources contain the “isMember” variable, either as an integer or boolean. So, create a command to handle changing a players variable to either “1” if it’s an integer, or “true” if it’s a boolean. I have not worked with private servers in so long, so forgive me for not spoonfeeding and giving you the code.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make people members?
item.dc:creator: @zane02 zane02
item.description:
@zane02 wrote:

depends if youve made a webclient with MySQL if not then forget about it… Unless you just wanna use the commad [which isnt effective if they wanna be member as soon as they donate, so they probly wont donate again. lol]

Read full topic

item.title: How to make people members?
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

under character files, open it up and it will say:

character-ismember = 0

change that to a 1 and go in game and use command ::makemem(name)

Read full topic
